posts.name: Bakesale Bette's
posts.note: Bakesale Bette's is a lunchtime bakery is a popular take-out stop for hefty fried chicken sandwiches and classic desserts. You need to order the fried chicken sandwich with home-made coke slaw.

posts.name: Clove and Hoof
posts.note: Clove and Hoof is a hip butcher shop displaying daily meats in a modern setting with cafe seating for bistro dishes. Order their version of a Philly cheesesteak or the fried chicken sandwich with fish sauce caramel.

posts.name: Navi Kitchen
posts.note: Navi Kitchen is a casual, chef-driven spot for counter-serve Cal-Indian fare in sunny digs with an outdoor patio. If they have them order their scotch egg which contains a duck egg if they serve them.

posts.name: Souley Vegan
posts.note: Souley Vegan is a warm corner eatery preparing vegan versions of Louisiana-style soul food, plus cocktails and desserts.

posts.name: Tamales Mi Lupita
posts.note: Tamales Mi Lupita is an acclaimed food truck serving Mexican tacos, tamales, Salvadoran pupusas, and empanadas.
